shabtay.coupon.system.facade

Class CustomerFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • shabtay.coupon.system.facade.CustomerFacade
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CouponClientFacade

    @Component
public class CustomerFacade
extends java.lang.Object
implements CouponClientFacade
    Class CustomerFacade gives the Customer to perform the following actions , after login was successfully: purchaseCoupon, getAllPurchasedCoupons, getAllPurchasedCouponsByType, getAllPurchasedCouponsByPrice, getCouponInCustomerDB
    Author:
    Shabtay Shalem

      • login

        public CouponClientFacade login(java.lang.String name,
                                java.lang.String password)
                         throws WrongLoginInputException,
                                java.lang.InterruptedException
        if login was successful customer is able to perform all methods in this class
        Specified by:
        login in interface CouponClientFacade
        Parameters:
        name - user name
        password - user's password
        Returns:
        CouponClientFacade or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException
        WrongLoginInputException - Exception is thrown in case Login input is Wrong

      • purchaseCoupon

        public void purchaseCoupon(Coupon coupon)
                    throws CouponAlreadyPurchsedByCustomerException,
                           AmountOfCouponsZeroException,
                           CouponExpiredException,
                           java.lang.InterruptedException
        Purchase coupon by Customer
        Parameters:
        coupon - the Coupon customer wants to purchase
        Throws:
        CouponAlreadyPurchsedByCustomerException - thrown in case coupon already purchased by customer
        AmountOfCouponsZeroException - thrown if coupon amount is zero
        CouponExpiredException - thrown if coupon date is expired
        java.lang.InterruptedException
